name: Will You Be Consumed?
description:
ALTERNATE DOWNLOAD LINK:

https://drive.google.com/uc?id=16BRTifu5a8gorQ4ddr3WHxEPRCv3HOhW&export=download

"Will You Be Consumed" is our submission to the Narrative Jam #3.

Listen to the tale of Devin, the Marine Biologist, who's struggling with his dissatisfaction in life. Will you manage to keep the metaphorical (and very literal) ship afloat, or be consumed by the abyssal depths of both the ocean, and your own soul...?

A ten-ish minute experience about maintaining your ship before it sinks under the waves. Make sure to keep everything in tip top shape, or the water will soon consume you.
